content.question: A particle <math alttext="P" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is located on the <math alttext="x" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-axis, as shown in the figure. A force exerted on the particle is given by the equation <math alttext="F equals, k x cubed" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>F</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>k</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>, where <math alttext="k equals, 4 newtons per meters cubed" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mfrac><mrow><mtext>N</mtext></mrow><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>. How much work is done by the force in moving the particle from <math alttext="x equals, 2 meters " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="x equals, 1 meter " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>Â ?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
